    • Uses of NotificationAction in org.sakaiproject.conditions.api

      Subinterfaces of NotificationAction in org.sakaiproject.conditions.api 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  Rule
      A Rule extends org.apache.commons.collections.Predicate and decorates it with an enum that represents the relationship among the Predicates within the rule: the Predicates that make up a rule are either AND'd together or OR'd together.

    • Uses of NotificationAction in org.sakaiproject.util

      Classes in org.sakaiproject.util that implement NotificationAction 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmailNotification
      EmailNotification is the notification action that handles the act of message (email) based notify, site related, with user preferences.
      class  SiteEmailNotification
      SiteEmailNotification is an EmailNotification that selects the site's participants (based on site access) as the recipients of the notification.
